00036 include_once("../../include.inc.php");

00039 if ($_FILES) {
00040   unset($_SESSION['pfw']);
00041   unset($_SESSION['filename']);
00042   $_SESSION['pfw'] = new pfw();
00043   $_SESSION['pfw']->parseRulebase (file_get_contents($_FILES['userfile']['tmp_name']));
00044   unlink ($_FILES['userfile']['tmp_name']);
00045 
00046   $flash['notice'] = "File uploaded successfully";
00047 }
00048 
00049 if ($_POST['filename']) {
00050   $filename = preg_replace ('/\s/', '_', $_POST['filename']);
00051   preg_match ('/[a-zA-Z0-9\.\-_]+/', $filename, $filename_a);
00052   $filename = $filename_a[0];
00053   $handle = fopen("$inst_dir/conf/packetfilter/". $filename, "w");
00054   if (fwrite($handle, $_SESSION['pfw']->generate()) === FALSE) {
00055     $flash['error'] = "Cannot write to file ($filename)";
00056   } else {
00057     $flash['notice'] = "File $filename save successfully.";
00058     $_SESSION['filename'] = $_POST['filename'];
00059   }
00060   fclose ($handle);
00061 }
00062 
00063 if ($_GET['load']) {
00064   unset($_SESSION['pfw']);
00065   $_SESSION['pfw'] = new pfw();
00066   $_SESSION['pfw']->parseRulebase (file_get_contents("$inst_dir/conf/packetfilter/". $_GET['load']));
00067   $_SESSION['filename'] = $_GET['load'];
00068 
00069   $flash['notice'] = "File loaded successfully";
00070 }
00071 
00072 if ($_GET['reload']) {
00073   unset($_SESSION['pfw']);
00074   unset($_SESSION['filename']);
00075   $_SESSION['pfw'] = new pfw();
00077 //   $filename = exec ($_SESSION['pfhost']['sudo']. " $inst_dir/bin/packetfilter.sh ". $_SESSION['pfhost']['connect']. " -r");
00078   $View->Controller($Output, 'GetPfwPfFileName', $_SESSION['pfhost']['connect']);
00079   $filename= $Output[0];
00080   $_SESSION['pfw']->parseRulebase (file_get_contents($filename));
00081   unlink ($filename);
00082   unset($_SESSION['filename']);
00083 }
00084 
00085 if ($_GET['download_current']) {
00086   if(isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']) && preg_match("/MSIE/", $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'])) {
00087     // IE Bug in download name workaround
00088     ini_set( 'zlib.output_compression','Off' ); 
00089   } 
00090   header( 'Content-Type: application/octet-stream' );
00091 #     header( 'Content-Size: $fileSize' );
00092   header( "Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=\"pf.conf\"");
00093   print $_SESSION['pfw']->generate();
00094   exit;
00095 }
00096 
00097 if ($_GET['download']) {
00098   if(isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']) && preg_match("/MSIE/", $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'])) {
00099     // IE Bug in download name workaround
00100     ini_set( 'zlib.output_compression','Off' ); 
00101   } 
00102   header( 'Content-Type: application/octet-stream' );
00103 #     header( 'Content-Size: $fileSize' );
00104   header( "Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=\"". $_GET['download']. "\"");
00105   readfile("$inst_dir/conf/packetfilter/". $_GET['download']);
00106   exit;
00107 }
00108 
00109 if ($_GET['delete']) {
00110   if (preg_match('/^\./', $_GET['delete'])) {
00111     $flash['error'] = "No dots in the beginning of filenames please.";
00112   }
00113   if (!file_exists("$inst_dir/conf/packetfilter/". $_GET['delete'])) {
00114     $flash['error'] = "There is no such file: ". $_GET['delete'];
00115   }
00116 
00117   if (!$flash['error']) {
00118     unlink ("$inst_dir/conf/packetfilter/". $_GET['delete']);
00119     $flash['notice'] = "File deleted successfully";
00120   }
00121 }
00122 
00123 $active = "load";
00124 page_header("Load &amp; Save");

00130 /*
00131  * The right column with file listings, if there are any files.
00132  */
00133 if (file_exists("$inst_dir/conf/packetfilter/")) {
00134     $dh  = opendir("$inst_dir/conf/packetfilter/");
00135     while (false !== ($filename = readdir($dh))) {
00136       if (!preg_match('/^\./', $filename)) {
00137         $conf_files[] = $filename;
00138       }
00139     }
00140 }
00141 
00142 if (count($conf_files)) {
00143 ?>

00165     print "<td><a href=\"?load=$file\">Load</a></td>";
00166     print "<td><a href=\"?download=$file\">Download</a></td>";
00167     print "<td><a href=\"?delete=$file\">Delete</a></td>";
00168     print "</tr>\n";
